articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: `No man in India...,` Viktor Axelsen after beating Lakshya Sen in badminton singles semis - WION
articles.description: Paris Olympics 2024: No man in India..., Viktor Axelsen after beating Lakshya Sen in badminton singles semis
articles.content:
Viktor Axelsen praised Lakshya Sen despite the Indian shuttler's loss in men's singles badminton semi-final on Sunday (Aug 4) at the ongoing Paris Olympics 2024.
